popups.name: Cait's Computer
popups.content:
Hi! I'm Caitlyn Parrish-Lewis...

I am a sophomore Computer Science and Engineering Psychology student at Tufts University.

I have a drive to create--to apply my classroom knowledge to real world impacts and foster further learning.

To get started, navigate into any of the folders on the side. At any time, you can close this tab by clicking the 'x' in the top right, and reopen it by choosing the 'Cait's Computer' icon. Or, you can scroll down to view my portfolio in a plaintext manner.

Thanks for stopping by! :-)

popups.name: Contact
popups.content:
Feel free to reach out at any time with any questions or comments!
I'd love to talk!

LinkedIn - linkedin.com/in/cparrishlewis
Email - caitlyn.parrish_lewis@tufts.edu < CLICK ME!

GitHub - github.com/rockyboo3

I look forward to speaking with you soon! :-)
